timeline.message:
Avoid field names clash

- Fix issue query argument with name `size` clashing with `Map.size`
- Fix potential field names clash with lambda arguments such as `writer`, 'listItemWriter', 'value' by prefixing last ones with `_`

Closes https://github.com/apollographql/apollo-android/issues/1953

timeline.bodyText:
Just want to compare this without using apply here. I would look like:
override fun valueMap(): Map<String, Any?> {
  val map = mutableMapOf<String, Any?>()
  if (episode.defined) map["episode"] = episode.value
  map["stars"] = stars
  return map
}
timeline.author: tasomaniac

replies.bodyText: well local variable map can collide if there is variable with the same name. To be 100% safe we need use this@
replies.author: sav007
